results.name: a(n) = least k > a(n-1) such that t(k) = t(n), for n >= 1, where t = A001285 (Thue-Morse sequence).
comment: The sequence (a(n+1)-a(n)) of first differences equals A171900(n+2) for n=1,2,... . - _Michel Dekking_, Apr 11 2019
